ai.summary: An easy 4.2 km coastal stroll in Dawlish, UK, offering scenic seafront views, a relaxed town route, and gentle terrain suitable for most walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat, paved promenades along the Dawlish coast, with short sections on town streets. Expect some curb edges and occasional gravel paths near the sea wall.
ai.safety_notes: - Suitable for most ages and fitness levels; bring a map or use a phone GPS. - Be mindful of pedestrians on busy promenades and cyclists on shared paths. - Check tide times and sea spray risk along the seafront. - Stay hydrated; if visiting pubs, designate a driver or use public transport. - Wear sturdy shoes and bring a light layer for Atlantic breezes.
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn for the most pleasant coastal walking; summer offers beach-friendly weather, while winter can be windy and cooler.

seo.title: Dawlish Ale Trail: Easy 4.2 km Coastal Walk in Dawlish, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Dawlish Ale Trail — an easy 4.2 km coastal walk in Dawlish, UK. Flat terrain, sea views, and practical tips for a relaxed day out.
